timeline.bodyText: I still don't understand why is it hardcoded. Could you please confirm that this path will be good for all CDH distributions for all types of installation? For manual installation, like dkr does, Cloudera Manager installation or if this path is changed (if it's possible, I'm not sure).
timeline.author: amedvedenko

replies.bodyText:
this is the default path for installations of any CDH / CDP clusters, when you use parcels from cloudera
if the path is changed, its up to the customer to use the right paths with the use custom classpath field
replies.author: AlixMetivier

replies.bodyText:
You can install parcels at any location in the filesystem. They are installed by default in /opt/cloudera/parcels. In contrast, packages are installed in /usr/lib.
ok, but is there a chance that there is no Parcels?
replies.author: amedvedenko

replies.bodyText: then its a custom class path and user can point to any folder he'd like
